registryIdentity.name: Open Token Registry
registryIdentity.description: A community-reviewed registry of tokens on Bitcoin Cash. Publishes names, symbols, icons, and other metadata about CashTokens via a Bitcoin Cash Metadata Registry (BCMR).

2023-05-12T20:18:04.000Z.name: OTR Chipnet Tokens
2023-05-12T20:18:04.000Z.description:
OpenTokenRegistry's example fungible token issued on Chipnet, a network used for Bitcoin Cash development.

In user interfaces with limited space, descriptions may be hidden beyond 140 characters or the first newline character; this example allows for testing of hiding and revealing extended descriptions.

2023-05-26T17:10:00.000Z.name: Emerald DAO U23
2023-05-26T17:10:00.000Z.description: A series of 2000 keycard NFTs which entitle each holder to a unique, on-chain Emerald DAO safebox holding at least 0.101 BCH. Beginning May 15, 2024, each keycard NFT may be burned to unlock its matching safebox./n/nThe Emerald DAO U23 series was created on May 15, 2023 to demonstrate new capabilities enabled by the CashTokens upgrade and to celebrate the 2023 upgrade event. Emerald DAO U23 is minted by an instance of Emerald DAO v2.1.0 with a minimum safebox size of 0.1 BCH and an initial endowment of 2 BCH into DAO's rewards pool.

2023-05-29T05:00:00.000Z.name: Bismuth Win Bi Token
2023-05-29T05:00:00.000Z.description:
Bismuth Win Bi Token is a new Cashtokens created on the May 15, 2023, which provides an on-chain resolution on Bitcoin Cash. 
 The Cashtokens used to be fungible tokens on SmartBCH, and issued with the total amount 21000000 and decimals 8 which pays a tribute to Bitcoin Cash .
 This token serves as coupons and points on the e-commerce shop Bismuth Shed.
 The logo represents the bismuth crystals with an abstract view.
